catalog.description: Prerecital hearing required at least three weeks before juried recitals.
catalog.note: NOTE: Fee. NOTE: Students mus register for recital before it can be scheduled; contact studio instructor for details.

catalog.title: Sophomore Recital.

course_headers.header_text: MUSIC 249: Students must register for their recital before it can be scheduled. Contact your studio instructor for details.
